original: yod pa dang med pa dang / rtag pa dang chad pa dang / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa gnyis su dmigs pa'i shes pa la sdang zhing 'joms pas na zhe sdang ste /

translated: Since anger is the hatred and destruction of the consciousness that observes the two, existence and nonexistence, permanence and annihilation, apprehended objects and an apprehending subject, and so on, it is anger.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //

original: de'i phyir zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'di ltar gti mug ni rmongs shing bye brag mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa ltar /

original: bems po ltar gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bems po ltar gnas pa'i phyir /

original: zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don to //
